title: COP26: Act now for our children, Queen urges climate summit
content:
1. COP26: Act now for our children, Queen urges climate summit  BBC News
  2. The Queen's speech at the COP26 Evening Reception  The Royal Family
  3. Queen tells Cop26 in video address it is ‘time for action’ on climate  The Guardian
  4. The Queen pays tribute to late husband as she pleads with world leaders over climate crisis  Daily Record
  5. WATCH: Britain's Prince Charles gives statement at COP26 climate summit in Glasgow  PBS NewsHour

localize.title: COP26：女王が気候サミットに向けて、子供たちのために今すぐ行動を
